name: Bosses Through Time
description:
Game made for Brackey's Game Jam 2020.2
The world is ruled by tyrant robots and you are a part of the resistance. How do you stop an unbeatable army? By rewinding through time to beat the maker! Turn the boss's weapons against them in this bullet hell boss mania!

Controls~
WASD to move
R to restart when prompted
left-click the menu to either close or start
